title: Fix your ranking system
body: Mates, I'm gold 5.... The past 12 games I've played have been against diamonds/platinums, while being paired with silvers/gold............. HOW IS THIS FAIR???? FIX IT BECAUSE THAT'S BEYOND TILTING WHEN YOU'RE TRYING TO CLIMB AND THAT HAPPENS

replies.body:
If you keep getting matched up with people in higher tiers, that's a good sign that you've been doing better than how most players do at your current rank, so the system is trying to help you rank up faster and put you in the tier you should be in! By playing and winning against higher ranked opponents, that should help boost you up quicker.

Look at this as a sign that you've been doing really well, and by doing so well you're slowly starting to go up against harder opponents so to speak.

How is that a good sign? When the OP is placed with SIlvers and gold that some I know aren't that good of a player/trolls/afkers/and also do not know how to compete against higher tiers, how does that help the OP climb?

Tell me, because I would love to know.

Everyone hates your matchmaking system. It's complete shit, excuse my french but I'm just being honest.
